comments:

home/plugins/org.eclipse.jdt.launching.j9/index.html

work on 3.2?  I tried it and got

But the latest support appears to be 1.5 years old.  

I recall hearing a rumour that a newer version was available/coming/...

the J9 launching support is not officially part of the SDK and is not 
supported/maintained. WSDD is submitting a patch to include the updates they 
have made to the J9 launching support - see bug 106683. However, we do not 
plan to offically support the plug-in.

Since J9 launches with a standard command line, the "Standard VM" that ships 
with the SDK is sufficient for most applications.

I have removed the link to the stale plug-in. We have applied the contribution to J9 launching (bug 106683) as a new starting point.

(Marking as invalid, as I didn't really fix anything here).
